Question: In 2011, this person completed his thirteenth studio album, titled Alpocalypse, which was released on June 21, 2011.
Hints: On January 24, 1998, this person had LASIK eye surgery to correct his extreme myopia.
This person married Suzanne Krajewski in 2001; their daughter, Nina, was born in 2003.
On January 25, 2010, this person announced that he signed a production deal with Warner Bros.
